content: {"name": "The Salvation Army Bronx Tremont ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food Pantry distribution - until supplies last\nNo need of volunteer as of now", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/bronxtremontyouth", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2121 Washington Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10457", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.852253, "longitude": -73.895515}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 584-6250", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
